Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

As the beacon continued to emit its message the sequencer locked onto 
a fo=
rm and began working on converting the protoform. As time ticked 
on it's e=
yes snapped open and looked around, pushing slowly on the 
door to open it.=
..

{China}

    Slowly the pods hatch opened with a hiss, the metallic fin=
gers of the transformer gripping the sides as he fought to stand up, his he=
ad turned looking around. "Earth."

    Sighing he stepped from the pod set=
tling to look around at the world as he let his diagnostic systems run thie=
r course. The crash with the shuttle had shaken some of his systems up but =
his memory circuits and logic sub routines seemed to be working. Turning he=
 looked at the pod, scanning it lightly before doing his best to hide its p=
resence.

    Sighing he trasnformed looking through the eyes of the huge p=
anda he had become, sniffing lightly at the air. This land seemed untouched=
 by transformers as of yet, short of his own presence. He reached out crack=
ing off a bamboo shoot and nibbled at it sighing contently. He had wondered=
 if there would be anything left of the planet untouched by the warring fac=
tions but he was glad to have found at least one spot yet unchanged.

    S=
hade grinned sitting down to eat enjoying the simplistic action in peace.
